items.content_html: Node OTP Sender is a lightweight npm package for generating and sending one-time passwords (OTPs) via email using Nodemailer. It provides a simple and easy-to-use API for integrating OTP functionality into your Node.js applications.
items.title: muhd-hanish/Otp-Sender-Package: Node OTP Sender is a lightweight npm package for generating and sending one-time passwords (OTPs) via email using Nodemailer. It provides a simple and easy-to-use API for integrating OTP functionality into your Node.js applications.
